S&P Falls Again As Tech Shares Weigh For Second Day In A Row                    https://bit.ly/2MVQX4r $SPY $XLK $FB $AAPL $GOOG $AMZN $MU

links.title: S&P Falls Again As Tech Shares Weigh For Second Day In A Row
links.description: BRIEFING.COM] The S&P 500 fell for the fourth time in five sessions on Thursday, with the typically high-flying technology sector underperforming for the second day in a row. The S&P 500 finished lower by 0.4%, while the tech-heavy Nasdaq tumbled 0.9%. The blue-chip Dow outperformed, however, tacking on 0.1%.

links.title: Tech stock sell-off could be just beginning if trade war with China worsens
links.description: Congressional scrutiny of social media companies and fears of new regulation pummeled their stocks, but other tech names could also soon be vulnerable to a new round of selling pressure if President Donald Trump goes through with new tariffs on Chinese goods.

$AAPL $FB $BBY $DE $QCOM $MU $MSFT $INTC $V

links.title: Here's how analysts expect different sectors to respond in an environment of rising trade tensions. Which stocks would be more or less affected by adverse trade actions
links.description: Here's how UBS analysts expect different sectors to respond in an environment of rising trade tensions, and their views on which stocks would be more or less affected by adverse trade actions. The stock market has not priced in an escalation of trade tensions, which would slam some companies more than others, bite into earnings growth and force companies to raise prices and cut spending, according to UBS.

links.title: Kim Jong-un Says He Wants Denuclearization Before Trump's Current Term Ends
links.description: SEOUL, South Korea - Offering an olive branch to President Trump, Kim Jong-un told a South Korean envoy that he wanted to denuclearize North Korea before Mr. Trump's current term ends in early 2021, the envoy said on Thursday.

links.description: Don't let KLA-Tencor's ( KLAC) bearishness scare you away from staying long Apple ( AAPL) .
